text: læa phwk khea klaw wa sing thi xyu nı thxng khxng psusatw hela nan chephaa brrda phuchay khxng rea theanan læa pen sing thi txng ham kæ brrda phrrya khxng rea læa hakwa man tay phwk khea phwk khea k pen phu mi hunswn nı man læa phraxngkh ca thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea nı kar thi khea di kahnd laksʹna wi thæcring phraxngkh pen phuthrng pricha yan phuthrng rxbru
